script_line.statement: importPackage(Packages.com.workpoint.common.data);[lf]importPackage(Packages.com.workpoint.common.script);[lf]importPackage(Packages.com.workpoint.client);[lf]importPackage(Packages.com.workpoint.common.logging);[lf][lf]logger = WPLogger.getLogger("com.workpoint.comverse.CompleteJobAlert");[lf][lf]logger.info("INFO: Runing CompleteJobAlert for ActivityInstId: " + [lf] SymbolTable.getSymbol("ActInstIDStr").getPrimaryValue() +[lf] " Iteration: " + SymbolTable.getSymbol("WorkItemIteration").getPrimaryValue());[lf][lf]nodeid = ThisJobData.getNodeByName("Job Alert");[lf]if (nodeid != null)[lf]{[lf] logger.debug("Node to complete: " + nodeid.getJobNodeID());[lf] nstate =nodeid.getNodeStateID();[lf] if (nstate != NodeConst.NODE_STATE_COMPLETED) [lf] {[lf] logger.debug("Node State: " + nstate + " -- Setting to: " + NodeConst.NODE_STATE_COMPLETED);[lf][lf] [lf] nodeid.changeState(NodeConst.NODE_STATE_COMPLETED);[lf] }[lf]}
